comment: * Sub-directory of each playlist containing all members.

variables.name: CONTENT_DIRECTORY
variables.comment:
* A subdirectory of each playlist containing all member audio
                 * files.

variables.name: AUDIO_ID
variables.comment: * The ID of the audio file

variables.name: PLAY_ORDER
variables.comment: * The order of the songs in the playlist

variables.comment: * The default sort order for this table

methods.name: public static final Uri getContentUri(String volumeName, long playlistId)
public static final boolean moveItem(ContentResolver res, long playlistId, int from, int to)
methods.comment:
* Convenience method to move a playlist item to a new location
                 * @param res The content resolver to use
                 * @param playlistId The numeric id of the playlist
                 * @param from The position of the item to move
                 * @param to The position to move the item to
                 * @return true on success

methodNames: public static final Uri getContentUri(String volumeName, long playlistId)
public static final boolean moveItem(ContentResolver res, long playlistId, int from, int to)
